channel.title: Failed to start Journal Service (and other errors)
channel.description:
Hello,
I didn't see a similar thread here so I'm coming to ask regarding a new issue that is occurring any time I try to start Whonix Workstation on VirtualBox (Version 6.1.32 r149290 (Qt5.6.2)).
Whonix Gateway appears to operate as intended without issue. However, whenever I start the Workstation I get an error regarding the failure to start Journal Service and others with which I am unfamiliar.
Additional errors are: - Dependency failed for Flush Journal to Persistent Storage - Failed to start Helper to synchronize boot up for ifupdown - Failed to start Rule-based manager for Devices Events and Files.
I can't think of any system change or changes to my snapshot that would have precipitated this. I would post a photo of the errors but that isn't allowed here.
Any thoughts or input? Thanks.

item.title: Failed to start Journal Service (and other errors)
item.dc:creator: user888
item.description:
OS is Windows 10 using VirtualBox (Version 6.1.32 r149290 (Qt5.6.2))

The forum software is reporting that pasting links to image files is unsupported, so the documentation on Uploading Images for Support isn’t correct, apparently.

Read full topic

item.title: Failed to start Journal Service (and other errors)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Uploading Images for Support

System Logs

Hardware Issues

sudo systemctl list-units --failed

Daemon Log View

Kicksecure – 4 Jan 22

Kicksecure ™ in VirtualBox - Troubleshooting - Kicksecure ™ does not Start?

VT-x is disabled in the BIOS. / VERR_VMX_MSR_VMXON_DISABLED / VERR_SSM_FIELD_NOT_CONSECUTIVE / supR3HardenedWinReSpawn / Enable VT-x in BIOS / Aborted Status / Guru Mediation

(Whonix is baed on Kicksecure.)

Whonix – 26 Jan 22

Information Booster might be Available!

Utilizing other resources to help solve questions/issues unspecific to Whonix ™.

Read full topic

item.title: Failed to start Journal Service (and other errors)
item.dc:creator: user888
item.description:
Hello,

I didn’t see a similar thread here so I’m coming to ask regarding a new issue that is occurring any time I try to start Whonix Workstation on VirtualBox (Version 6.1.32 r149290 (Qt5.6.2)).

Whonix Gateway appears to operate as intended without issue. However, whenever I start the Workstation I get an error regarding the failure to start Journal Service and others with which I am unfamiliar.

Additional errors are:

  • Dependency failed for Flush Journal to Persistent Storage
  • Failed to start Helper to synchronize boot up for ifupdown
  • Failed to start Rule-based manager for Devices Events and Files.

I can’t think of any system change or changes to my snapshot that would have precipitated this. I would post a photo of the errors but that isn’t allowed here.

Any thoughts or input? Thanks.
